content: 2cl counts as initial 3cl *treble_crochet chain 1 v chain 1 treble_crochet 3cl repeat from * around slip_stitch to top of 2cl round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to chain 3 round 3 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 v chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 5cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to top of initial 3cl round 4 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 double_crochet in next 8 st *skip 5cl double_crochet in next 9 st repeat from * around skip last 5cl slip_stitch to join round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in next st counts as initial 2cl * treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice 4cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to join round 6 slip_stitch to first treble_crochet chain 3 and double_crochet in next 9 st *skcl double_crochet 9 repeat from * around ending skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 round 7 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl * treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice 5cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to join round 8 slip_stitch to first treble_crochet chain 3 and double_crochet in next 9 st *skcl double_crochet 9 repeat from * around ending skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 round 9 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice chain 1 5cl repeat from * around ending 2cl in last 2 st slip_stitch to join round 10 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 and double_crochet in next 11 st *skcl double_crochet 11 repeat from * around to ending skip last st slip_stitch to chain 3 round 11 chain 3 3cl counts as initial 4cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice chain 1 7cl repeat from * around ending 3cl in last 3 st slip_stitch to join round 12 repeat round 10 yoke stitch diagram divide for body and sleeves place marker m after 6th 10th and 16th patt reps marker goes in the skcl round 13 chain 3 2cl counts as initial 3cl *chain 1 treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet twice chain 1 7cl repeat from * until next marker ending 3cl in last 3 st before m now skip the next 4 patt reps restarting just after next m 3cl repeat from * once more slip_stitch in 3cl to join round 14 slip_stitch to first chain space chain 3 and double_crochet in next 11 st *skcl double_crochet 11 repeat from * around for skcl at underarms skip both 3cl slip_stitch to join work even for desired number of rounds if any before waist shaping to work even repeat rounds 11 and 12 begin waist shaping see partial stitch diagram next page round 15 chain 3 3cl counts as initial 4cl * treble_crochet chain 1 twice v chain 1 treble_crochet
